javadoc:
Component Provider that shows the known extensions in Ghidra in a {@link GTable}. Users may
 install/uninstall extensions, or add new ones.

methods.name: createMainPanel
methods.comment: Creates the main panel for the extension dialog.

methods.javadoc:
Creates an action to allow users to manually add new extensions.
@param panel The extensions table panel.
methods.name: createAddAction
methods.comment: Creates an action to allow users to manually add new extensions.

methods.name: hasCorrectVersion
methods.comment:
Verifies that the extension(s) represented by the given file (or directory) have
 a version that is compatible with the current version of Ghidra.

params.name: file
params.comment: the file or directory to inspect

return.comment: true if the extension(s) has the correct version

methods.name: createRefreshAction
methods.comment: Creates an action to refresh the extensions list.

name: ExtensionTableProvider
comment:
Component Provider that shows the known extensions in Ghidra in a GTable. Users may
 install/uninstall extensions, or add new ones.
